archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries
did.physdesc: Collection contains 16 boxes totalling 16 cubic feet (24 linear feet)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: the Virginians for Dulles Collection, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Collection was acquired in 1990 from Hon. Clive DuVal, II.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Virginians for Dulles (VFD) was a citizen action group seeking to reroute airline traffic in the interest of ecology and safety from Washington National Airport to Dulles International Airport in Loudoun County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains minutes meeting agenda, correspondence between board members, financial and other administrative documents of the organization. Also included are transcripts of testimony before the Aviation Subcommittee of the U.S. House Committee on Public Works and Transportation, and legal briefs of suits filed by VFD against National Airport. Materials date from 1968-1981.
